data.name: Shajra Namla
data.detailed_description:
Relive the excitement of one of the most popular traditional games; Shajra Namla. Shajra Namla is a fast game that keeps you on your toes. Play alone and test your reaction speed against the best! Or play against your friends in an exciting game of Shajra Namla. Collect apples to unlock different characters.

Solo Mode: A single player plays Shajra Namla against different characters. With each win, a new level is unlocked and more apples are collected that can be used to get new characters.

Party Mode: two players or more can compete against each other in a fast-paced game to see who is the last player standing!

data.short_description: Relive your childhood! Play Shajra Namla Now!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: i7
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
